title: Beef Stroganoff
tagline: Seared beef in creamy mushroom sauce
ingredients: 1½ lbs beef tenderloin or sirloin, sliced thin
steps: Season beef. Sear in oil and 1 tbsp butter over high until browned but still pink, 1-2 minutes per side. Transfer out.
Add remaining butter and mushrooms. Brown 8 minutes. Add onion, cook 5 minutes.
Add garlic, 30 seconds. Add brandy, scrape up bits.
Add broth, reduce by half, about 5 minutes.
Reduce heat. Stir in sour cream and mustard.
Return beef and juices. Heat through.
Serve over egg noodles with parsley.
notes: Don't overcook beef - should be medium rare.
Add sour cream off heat to prevent curdling.
